actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to designate the second week of February of each year as "National Vocational Education, and National Vocational Industrial Clubs of America (VICA) Week".

summary.text: Designates the second week in February of each year as "National Vocational Education, and National Vocational Industrial Club of America (VICA) Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution to designate the second week of February of each year as "National Vocational Education, and National Vocational Industrial Clubs of America (VICA) Week".
